CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Power__c, 'High'), IF( ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Interest__c, 'High'), 'Manage Closely', IF( ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Interest__c, 'Low'), 'Keep Satisfied', '' ) ), IF( ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Power__c, 'Low'), IF(ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Interest__c, 'High'), 'Keep Informed', IF( ISPICKVAL(project_cloud__Interest__c, 'Low'), 'Monitor', '' ) ), '' ) )
CustomField.label: Engagement
